Flow.description: Added redirect to Exp Cloud Page
Flow.label: Client Registration

fields.name: CompletedMsg
fields.fieldText: Thanks for completing your application, we will get in touch with you shortly for next steps.

fields.name: DisgDisp
fields.fieldText: Please fill out all of the following questions to the best of your ability. If you don't know an answer, it can be left unanswered until the screening process with the Program Director

fields.name: Loss_of_balance_to_sudden_movement
fields.fieldText: Loss of balance to sudden movement

fields.name: Weight_bear_on_one_foot_w_assist
fields.fieldText: Weight bear on one foot w/ assist

fields.name: Number_of_steps_followed_at_a_time
fields.fieldText: Number of steps followed at a time

value.stringValue: Please upload a video in therapy or activity
Please upload a video to continue

fields.name: firpagetext
fields.fieldText:
We Can Ride Client Registration

Welcome! Please complete the online registration with We Can Ride.

fields.name: InfoMenu
fields.fieldText:
Current Client: {!ClientRecordVar.Name}


Please complete each section, once you have all the forms completed, click on submit the application

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Photo Release {!ClientRecordVar.Photo_Release__c} Granted","value":"PhotoRelease","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand","iconName":null,"index":0},{"label":"Emergency Treatment Form {!ClientRecordVar.Auth_for_Emerg_Med_Treatment__c}","value":"AuthForEmergencyTreatment","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand","iconName":null,"index":1},{"label":"Client Waiver Form {!ClientRecordVar.Client_Waiver__c}","value":"ClientWaiver","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand","index":2},{"label":"Medical History {!ClientRecordVar.Medical_History_Form_PL__c}","value":"MedicalHistory","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand","index":3}]

fields.name: moreinfo
fields.fieldText:
Only complete the following forms if diagnosis applies.

They must be completed by a physician

fields.name: HelpfulDisp
fields.fieldText:
These are helpful documents, please download them for your records


2023 Payment Policy Notice

2023 Session Dates

Client Handbook

Therapeutic & Hippotherapy Riding Guidelines

Weight limit

fields.name: ClientInfo
fields.fieldText:
Client Information


NOTE: Please complete each page to the extend of possible. You won't be able to come back and fill missing information

validationRule.errorMessage: You have to be at least 26 months of age to participate

fields.name: PaaymentDIsp
fields.fieldText:
Responsibility for Payment.


I hereby acknowledge that I am ultimately responsible for all charges applied to my account whether or not covered by insurance or waiver. I further acknowledge that I have read, understand and agreed to the Payment Policy Notice (separate form) as well as all additional policies and procedures regarding class cancellation and payments.

fields.name: disclaimer_disp
fields.fieldText: By selecting agreement of any term, using any device; means, or action, you consent to the legally binding terms and conditions of this Agreement. You further agree that your electronic signature on this document is as valid as if you signed the document in writing.

fields.name: DisplayRedirect
fields.fieldText:
Please go to

https://wecanride.my.site.com/client/s/login

to register

fields.name: WLDisp
fields.fieldText: In keeping with our veterinarian's recommendations, WCR has weight limits based on height and weight. If the client is over the limit, they may be appropriate for groundwork lessons. Please continue to fill out the paperwork if you are interested in groundwork (working with the horse on the ground). Please reach out to clients@wecanride.org with any questions.
